'''Hydro Mimic Frogs''' are [[Hydro Mimics]] summoned by the [[Oceanid]], but can also be encountered on their own in the [[Spiral Abyss]] or during [[Quests]]. They resemble giant [[Frog]]s. They take more damage from {{Geo}}.

==Stats==
{{Enemy Stats
|hydro_res    = Immune
|resglobal    = 15%
|geo_res      = -40%

|hp_ratio     = 3
|atk_ratio    = 5
|hp_type      = 1
|atk_type     = 2
}}

==Abilities and Attacks==
*'''Torrential Waves:''' Shoots a long-range wave straight at the player, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|Hydro DMG}} on hit.
*'''High Leap:''' Leaps upwards before slamming down, dealing '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|AoE Hydro DMG}} over the indicated area.
*'''Water Bomb:''' When defeated, transforms into a bomb that covers a wide area and deals massive '''100% ATK''' as {{Color|AoE Hydro DMG}} upon detonation.
